titles.title: A resolution to strike paragraph 2 of rule XXII of the Standing Rules of the Senate, relating to cloture.
A resolution to strike paragraph 2 of rule XXII of the Standing Rules of the Senate, relating to cloture.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: Amends rule XXII (Precedence of motions) of the Standing Rules of the Senate to repeal the requirements for the precedence and procedure of cloture motions with respect to debate on any measure, motion, other matter pending before the Senate, or unfinished business (thus eliminating any provision for cloture of debates).
